GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted in descending order by creation date

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the correct properties

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id each with the correct properties, sorted by newest comments first

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Request body accepts an object with username and body, returns with the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Request body accepts a newVote object and returns the updated article with the vote count changed by the number on the inc_votes property

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment with the given comment_id and returns a 204 status

GET /api/users.description: responds with an array of user objects, each with the correct properties

GET /api/articles?sort_by=:column&order=.description: sorts the articles by any valid column (defaulting to created_at), in asc or desc (defaulting to desc)
